item.title: Manjaka x Noko
item.description: This pairing was between our female from Nugget x Loko, and our male from Colorado Chameleons, F1 Manjaka. Manjaka was pretty unassuming as a juvenile, but he became one of our favorite YBBB Ambilobe breeders as an adult. He had an extra blue bar, and yellows were classic Ambilobe. Loko came to us from Chromatic Chameleons and Nugget is our favorite 3rd gen YBBB breeder. Hatch dates 11/19/22 - 11/29/22 Hatch rate 24/24 M1

item.title: Manjaka x Tigerlilly
item.description: This pairing was between our female from Nugget x Amara, and our male from Colorado Chameleons, F1 Manjaka. Manjaka was pretty unassuming as a juvenile, but he became one of our favorite YBBB Ambilobe breeders as an adult. He had an extra blue bar, and yellows were classic Ambilobe. Amara came to us from Brian Stewart and her lineage is more rainbow Ambilobe. Hatch dates 11/03/22 - 11/07/2022 Hatch rate 23/23 F1

item.title: Parasi
item.description: Parasi is a great Ambilobe female from our F1 sire from Colorado Chameleon named Manjaka and our female from Jack and Mavokely. Many of her brothers had great yellow bodies and blue bars - a few had mixed red/blue bars. We are very excited to see what she does with WC Tratra! Parasi Parasi1 Filial F2-CG14 Sire Manjaka Dam Parasy 5 Generation Tree Ancestral Report for Parasi (F2-CG14) Generation 1 1.

item.title: Manjaka x Parasy
item.description: This pairing was between our female from Jack x Mavokely, and our male from Colorado Chameleons, F1 Manjaka. Manjaka was pretty unassuming as a juvenile, but he became one of our favorite YBBB Ambilobe breeders as an adult. He had an extra blue bar, and yellows were classic Ambilobe. Mavokely came to us from Bobby Ruddock and she brings some of my favorite YBBB Ambilobe genetics - Amarillo. Hatch dates 7/26/22 - 8/20/2022 Hatch rate 8/18 F1

item.title: Manjaka x Lokana
item.description: This pairing was between our F1 sire from Colorado Chameleons, Manjaka, and our female from Chromatic Chameleons, Lokana. Lokana is a mix of Chromatic and Kammerflage Kreations yellow-bodied blue bar Ambilobe while Manjaka is a wonderful YBBB from a recent import, WC Arlo. The outcomes have been extremely consiste YBBB thus far which are not directly related to our main line of Ambilobe. They are a great option for people looking for high quality pairings with our multi-generational lines.

item.title: Ranoka
item.description: Ranoka is a really interesting mix of F1 Manjaka and Kromatisk, Lokana’s sire. He has the radiant yellow that Manjaka has, but he also has the red embers at the edge of the yellow like Kromatisk - this almost looks orange at times and gives it an almost 3D look against a blue background. Really unique animal! Ranoka Ranoka1 Ranoka2 Ranoka3 Ranoka4 Ranoka5 Ranoka6 Ranoka7 Ranoka8 Filial F2-CG14 Sire Manjaka Dam Lokana 5 Generation Tree

item.title: Tsara
item.description: Tsara Tarehy means attractive in Malagasy. We named the two sisters from Manjaka x Lokana Tsara and Tarehy :). Check out that clutch to see how consistent their YBBB phenotypes were. It is a very good proxy for what these two sisters bring to the table: great yellows and bars that shift from Landy to Manjaka’s blues. Very good complement to our existing lines! Tsara Tsara1 Tsara2 Filial F2-CG14 Sire Manjaka Dam Lokana 5 Generation Tree

item.title: Tarehy
item.description: Tsara Tarehy means attractive in Malagasy. We named the two sisters from Manjaka x Lokana Tsara and Tarehy :). Check out that clutch to see how consistent their YBBB phenotypes were. It is a very good proxy for what these two sisters bring to the table: great yellows and bars that shift from Landy to Manjaka’s blues. Very good complement to our existing lines! Tarehy Tarehy1 Tarehy2 Filial F2-CG14 Sire Manjaka Dam Lokana 5 Generation Tree

item.title: Manjaka
item.description: Manjaka brings fresh genetics from a new WC sire, Arlo, who was acclimated by Chris Neeley at Colorado Chameleon. Arlo has a distinct look with red sprinkled on blue bars and a nice yellow body. Very cool Ambilobe import and one of the nicer ybbb with red highlights to come in the past few years. We are very lucky to have the opportunity to work with him! Manjaka Manjaka1

item.title: Lineage: Brian Collins
item.description: Higgins Higgins Higgins1 Higgins2 Sire Pelellu Dam Sire Anguar
